data.text: @kevinhorgan @IanSplis @MarcLobliner Produced by Bones in Startrek?
@IanSplis @Gearoidmuar @MarcLobliner The first was?
@kevinhorgan @Gearoidmuar @MarcLobliner The first for covid. Not the first mRNA vaccine ever.

@IanSplis @Gearoidmuar @MarcLobliner Normally? These mRNA vaccines are the first, so how can you  cite 3-5 years for something unprecedented? Given the circumstances these vaccines are being evaluated v reasonably.
@mikemahony @MarcLobliner I’ll take any advice you can give me - as you appear to be the expert (having brought the topic up) 🍌🍌🍌🌭🌭🌭
@MarcLobliner They are smart to decline.
@MarcLobliner “Spoke to a good buddy of mine” = “I’m about to pull some really tasty bullshit out of my arsehole”. #wheresthebeef #beefhead
@Brien1280O @Gearoidmuar @MarcLobliner Opioids too.... hell don’t forget Bayer used to sell heroine in the Us through the Sears Catalog
@Gearoidmuar @IanSplis @MarcLobliner The effects on reproduction were not tested. But go on. Tell me more false narratives.

@MarcLobliner All vaccinations should be given to elderly politicians, pelosi et al.
I mean, the elderly need it and the side effects can be classified as term limits.
@IanSplis @MarcLobliner They went through all the normal steps. Modern technology and increased knowledge plus great need boosted the speed of everything. They were producing it provisionally.
@Gearoidmuar @MarcLobliner The vaccines weren’t tester properly. Normally a mRNA vaccine takes 3-5 years to properly bring to market. These two less than 12 months.
@IanSplis @MarcLobliner Who told you this? Corona viruses mutate a bit but unlike flu, the mutations are small. The two vaccines tested properly are bloody effective.

@Gearoidmuar @MarcLobliner The vaccine was designed with the old strain in mind. 23 mutations the possibility that the vaccine works against this strain is less than 10%. This is why the vaccine was useless from the start. Coronaviruses mutate rapidly. This is believed to be the 3rd strain already
@IanSplis @MarcLobliner On what do you base that statement? Are you the only one who knows that this doesn't work against the new strain?
@MarcLobliner Exactly,  why do they have to televise vaccinations? LOL
@MarcLobliner Why is it that you have to explain what’s right for you?
@MarcLobliner And now there is a new Covid B1.1.7 strain that has 23 mutations and is more contagious that the vaccine does nothing about. It’s laughable
@MarcLobliner Mil doesn't want it either 🤫
@MarcLobliner Are they still enforcing this lockdown shit!?

@MarcLobliner I am in no hurry to take it. I am not in any high risk group, I do not have any pre existing conditions and I am healthy. There is no reason to get it before seniors and other at risk groups have gotten it
@MarcLobliner Because they know how the immune system works.
@MarcLobliner 20% actually took it? Were literally going back to ground zero or does it even exists again
